mapper.insert:
SELECT alcohol_free_reply_seq.nextVal FROM dual
INSERT INTO alcohol_free_reply (free_reply_no, board_no, ssn, free_content, free_replyDate, free_like, free_hate) VALUES (#{reply_no}, #{board_no}, #{memberDTO.ssn}, #{content}, sysdate, #{like}, #{hate})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM alcohol_free_reply WHERE free_reply_no=#{reply_no} AND board_no=#{board_no}
mapper.select: SELECT free_reply_no, board_no, t.ssn, free_content, free_replyDate, free_like, free_hate, m.nickname FROM alcohol_free_reply t, member m WHERE t.ssn = m.ssn AND board_no=#{value}
